section.title: How much and How many
section.sectiontitle: We use How many with countable plural nouns.
section.text1a: How many biscuits does Luke eat every day?
section.text2a: How many students are there in the class?
section.sectiontitle2: We use How much with uncountable nouns.
section.text4a: How much milk does he have in his coffee?
